name: TME - Agricultural Laboratory
desc: Modern research facilities that can cultivate better plant life and provide better husbandry practices.

name: TME - Atmosphere Regulator
desc: Massive industrial vents and pumps that can combine, store, and release gases from deep within the planet.

name: TME - Construction Grid
desc: A single-use structural grid for constructing Megastructures like stations and gates.

name: TME - Element Synthesizer
desc: Research facility for creating and developing rare minerals with unique properties using known elements.

name: TME - Geomorphology Station
desc: Facilities for research and subjugation that can destroy opposing troops and improve surface conditions.

name: TME - Mineral Replicator
desc: Research facility for creating and developing common minerals with unique properties using known elements.

name: TME - Stellar Manufactory
desc: Stellar factories and control centers capable of creating stellar shades and mirrors that are launched into orbit.

name: TME - Terrestrial Engine
desc: Underground mining facilities capable of influencing the planet's core to regulate tectonic and gravitational activity.
